answerText: resonance [or word forms; or mesomerism][10] To represent the true resonance hybrid of benzene, it is customary to draw a hexagon with this attribute, rather depicting the three double bonds.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 17 | 21 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This phenomenon explains why all three bonds of carbonate have the same length. For 10 points each: [10] Name this phenomenon in which electrons are delocalized over an atom, resulting in multiple Lewis structures.
